CustomField.description: The organizational account (Ex: business, high school, college, etc.) a student is affiliated with. This field along with the Affiliation Role, Affiliation Status, and Primary Affiliation fields creates an Affiliation when converted to a Contact. Filtered to exclude the Administrative Account Record Type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the organizational account (Ex: business, high school, college, etc.) a student is affiliated with.
CustomField.label: Affiliated Account
